entry.title: U.N. Says Russia Is Blocking Aid to Flooded Areas in Ukraine
entry.content: Kyiv’s forces took control of another village along the southern front line, the first new territory they have claimed in a week, following a pause to their counteroffensive.

entry.title: How We Told the Story of One Russian's Surrender to a Ukrainian Drone
entry.content: Aerial footage captured Ruslan Anitin’s bid for survival in its entirety, but it still left questions unanswered. So a WSJ team spent 10 days tracking him down.

entry.title: Flooding Hits American Towns Far From Oceans and Big Rivers
entry.content: Unprecedented storms in Kentucky illustrate a growing and often overlooked threat: severe flooding across the inland U.S.
